description:
Feeling creative? Introducing ThemeKit: The Ultimate App for iPhone Themes, Widgets, and Customization! Daily updates with 5-8 content sets to make your home screen unique! Customize themes and widgets with your own photos in a snap.

Key Features:

- Easy Editing
Transform your device with ThemeKit, a powerful kit for convenience and style! Edit iPhone themes and widgets. Choose ready-made themes or create your own in a few steps. Works with iOS 18!

- Rich Widgets & Themes & Lock Screen
Calendar, Time, Battery, Quotes, Clock, Collage, Weather widgets...choose what you need. Use collage widgets to customize. Dynamic widgets and wallpapers for a cool screen, just for you!

- HD Wallpapers & Dynamic Island
Get high-quality wallpapers: Depth Effect, dynamic island, and more! Make iPhone 15 fun or match lock screen widgets. Find wallpapers in our themes!

- App Icon Changer
Pick from 5000+ icons - gothic, anime, minimalist, neon, sports, nature, cute, retro... Customize home screen with high-quality icons!

- Festive and Featured
Find Christmas, Halloween, Skull, Butterfly, and more. Themes, widgets, icons, wallpapers - all in one place.

- Daily Updates
New themes, widgets, icons, wallpapers daily! Endless options for you to choose from.

- Match Freely
Themes, widgets, icons, wallpapers - match without other apps! Customize home and lock screen. Thousands of combinations to personalize your iPhone.

Download ThemeKit now and get creative!

• Subscribe for all features.
• Different plans available.

description:
# Popular on the App Store #
# Top Free Graphic Design App #

ThemePack is a free app with aesthetic app icons, awesome wallpapers, and stylish widgets, which helps you customize your home screen and lock screen like never before.

Are you bored with the standard phone style? With ThemePack, you can easily find your favorite widgets, amazing icon packs, and high-quality wallpapers, which are made by professional designers to change your home screen.

■Trendy App Icons changer
Discover the amazing collection of App icon themes, and replace your default icons for all of your favorite apps. Change your app icons for Free, and decorate your device to be unique.

■Stylish Widgets
Select widgets you like, Time, Date, Calendar, and Photo are available now, and more fancy widgets are waiting for you to discover.

■Still And Live Wallpapers
Liven up your screen with exclusive wallpapers and backgrounds. There are many genres of wallpapers, such as aesthetic, animals, glitter, nature, anime wallpaper, and so on. Every wallpaper is checked carefully and make sure a perfect display.

■New Lock Screen wallpapers
Change your screen with wallpaper customization options offered by iOS 16

Fancy themes for iPhone: cool widgets, customized app icons, aesthetic wallpapers. Endless personalized options give you a new way to express yourself, and make your iPhone outstanding. A cool screen-saver app is super easy to set up.

REQUIREMENTS
• Icon Dealer works on all iOS devices with the only requirement being that it is running iOS 14+.
• You can subscribe for unlimited access to all features within ThemePack.
• Subscriptions are billed weekly, monthly, or annually at the rate selected depending on the subscription plan.
• Your payment will be charged to your iTunes Account as soon as you confirm your purchase.
• When canceling a subscription, your subscription will stay active until the end of the period. Auto-renewal will be disabled, but the current subscription will not be refunded.

Explore our enormous collection of stylish icons, themes, wallpapers, and widgets! You’re free to jazz up your phone’s Lock & Home Screens to your taste.


And it's not just about the look. With Themify widgets for Lock & Home screens and StandBy, you can keep the info you need handy, turn your phone into a smart display, and even have a digital pet right on your screen!


COMPLETE MAKEOVER of your device!

Themify gives you a wide range of tools to express yourself. With our app, you're free to customize your phone to your liking. Enjoy state-of-the-art content and unleash your creativity!

Key features:


■ 3-in-1 Themes


Whether you love dark hues or you’re a diehard pastel fan, you can decorate your screen to create a harmonious space! Install a theme that suits your taste, and watch your app icons, widgets, and wallpapers come together seamlessly.


■ Vast Widget Collection
Interactive widgets to track activities that are important to you, e.g., sleep or steps
Widgets with time & calendar, weather, inspiring quotes, or just eye-pleasing pics—add any info right to your Home & Lock Screens
Cute digital pets (remember to feed and bathe them!)
Widgets for StandBy with always-on time, date, or real-time weather
Informative widgets created especially for iPad

■ Theme Maker

If you’d like to add a personal touch to your Home Screen theme, use our Theme Maker. Feel completely free to change whatever you want and create a one-of-a-kind design for your device.


■ 2000+ Icon Packs


For those who are bored with the same standard app icons, we have an array of custom icon packs. You'll surely find content that resonates with your unique taste!


■ Live and Still Wallpapers

Anime, Urban, Animals, Nature, Cars, just to name a few—we have still and live wallpapers for every taste and mood! With Themify, you're entirely free to choose any wallpaper that perfectly suits your vibe.


■ Apple Health Integration 


Sync Themify with the Health app and effortlessly track your daily sleep, steps, and water intake from convenient and stylish widgets. 

UNLIMITED ACCESS MEMBERSHIP SUBSCRIPTION
• You can subscribe to all features within Themify for unlimited access.
• Subscriptions are billed weekly or annually at the rate selected depending on the subscription plan.

Create Beautiful Invitations in Minutes — No Design Skills Needed.

Looking to invite guests to your wedding, birthday party, baby shower, or corporate event with stunning invitations? Our Invitation Maker app helps you design professional cards in minutes — even if you've never designed before.

Need eye-catching invitations, greeting cards, or announcements for your special occasions? With our Invitation Maker & Card Designer app, you can create beautiful designs in minutes — no graphic design skills required. From wedding invitations to birthday cards, baby shower announcements to business event invites, everything is just a few taps away.

Why Choose Our Invitation Maker?
- 30,000+ ready-to-use templates designed for weddings, birthdays, anniversaries, baby showers, and 500+ events & festivals
- Customize easily with fonts, stickers, backgrounds, borders & decorative elements
- Add your photos, event details, and personal touches to every invitation
- Export in multiple formats — ready for print or instant digital sharing
- Suitable for wedding invitations, birthday cards, party invites, save-the-dates, thank you cards, greeting cards, and social media announcements

Smart RSVP & Guest Management
Our app goes beyond just creating invitations with powerful guest management features:
Built-in RSVP Tracking – Collect guest responses directly through your digital invitations
Guest List Management – Track who's attending, dietary preferences, and plus-ones in one place
Automated Reminders – Send follow-up messages to guests who haven't responded
Real-time Updates – See RSVPs as they come in and manage your guest count effortlessly

AI Tools for Effortless Design
AI Background Remover – Remove or replace photo backgrounds with one tap for perfect couple photos or profile pictures
QR Code Generator – Add scannable QR codes for event details, venue maps, or gift registries
Clickable Links in PDFs – Insert links to your event website, RSVP form, registry, or venue directions that work when your PDF invitation is opened

Fast, Simple & Professional
- Choose a template that matches your event
- Customize with text, photos, event details, and colors
- Enable RSVP tracking and guest management
- Add clickable links for venue maps, registries, or event websites
- Export or share directly via email, WhatsApp, social media, or print

Create stunning invitations in minutes — no training required.

Make Every Invitation Special
Download the Invitation Maker app today and start designing cards that excite your guests and set the perfect tone for your celebration.

Mico — Your Home Screen Personalization App, fully optimized for OS 26！
Fully adapted for OS 26 — unlock customizable Animated Artwork, explore a wide range of popular 3D & Depth Effect Wallpapers, and enjoy the upgraded Liquid Glass Theme that brings a unique texture to your home screen.
【OS 26 Depth Effect Wallpaper & Liquid Glass Theme】
* Depth Effect Wallpaper：Specially optimized for OS 26, the all-new Depth Effect Wallpapers use intelligent layering and spatial design to seamlessly blend time and wallpaper elements, bringing a vivid sense of depth and personality to your screen.
* Liquid Glass Theme：Explore the artistic fusion of light and fluid textures, unlocking a fresh and unique visual experience.

【DIY Live Wallpapers & Battery Icon Wallpaper】
Supports static/dynamic wallpaper creation, with a wide range of templates like Polaroid, heart collage, flip cards, labubu live wallpaper, and more. There are also various battery icon stickers and battery widget to personalize the top status bar of your phone, making your wallpapers even more fun. Your home screen becomes a unique design that's truly your own.

【Theme Template, One-Click To Use】 
Mico's theme pack lets you mix and match stylish widgets and lock screen templates to create a home screen that's uniquely yours. Top widgets and stunning wallpapers created by designers from around the world—yours to use with just a tap. Effortlessly design your perfect home screen.

【Home & Lock Screen Widgets】 
Transform your iOS experience with customizable widgets for both Home Screen and Lock Screen!  
*Couple widget: Couple widgets let you and your partner share a little love right on your home screens. No matter how far apart you are, you’ll always feel connected.
*Battery widget: The Battery Widget not only shows your power level but also matches your home screen aesthetic with customizable styles and themes.
*Photo widget: provide a variety of styles of photo frames, cute pets, retro game consoles, movie film styles, everything 
*Animation widgets: emoticon packs, flashing emoticons, GIF, bear emoticon animations, cute cat animations, flashing hearts... 

【New iOS 18 Widgets & Themes】
Fully compatible with iOS 18 – supports customizing the control center and lock screen buttons, with plenty of cute, text, and animated icons. 

【Support Apple Health Tracking】 
Mico Lock Screen Widget integrates Apple Health App to display health data such as steps in widgets. If you want to use a super widget that contains health data, please allow the APP to access health data when entering the widget preview page.

3. Sketch Templates: Explore a wide array of sketch templates from animals to vehicles, Manga to Anime, and more. These templates are perfect for practicing and perfecting your trace drawing technique.

4. Instantly Find and Trace Anything: Import photo from your camrera or gallery or browser. Once you find something inspiring, you can instantly convert it into a traceable sketch and start drawing right away.

6. Capture the Process with Video Recording: Document your creative journey by recording your AR Draw Sketch sessions. This feature allows you to revisit your process or share it with others, providing a unique way to showcase your artistic evolution.

7. Save and Share: Once you've finished your trace to sketch creation, save it to your gallery or share it on social media. Show off your sketch trace to family and friends with just a few taps.

description:
Experience the next generation of drawing with Sketchify – the ultimate tool that transforms how you sketch, trace, and create art. Powered by advanced Augmented Reality (AR) and Artificial Intelligence (AI), this app redefines what's possible in digital and real-world drawing.

Whether you're a beginner, a hobbyist, or a professional artist, Sketchify provides all the tools you need to learn, practice, and create – with unmatched precision and creative freedom.

CORE FEATURES

* AR Drawing – Project, Trace & Create:

- Use your phone or tablet camera to project any image onto real-world surfaces – paper, canvas, wall, or any workspace.
- Trace outlines directly through the screen in real time, making it perfect for learning to draw, replicating artwork, or creating complex designs.
- AR Drawing adapts to your environment and gives you the feeling of drawing with guidance – not just on screen, but in real space.

* Import Image – Draw Anything You Imagine:

- Instantly import photos, sketches, or designs from your photo library.
- Combine with AR Drawing to trace your personal references with perfect positioning.
- Adjust size, rotate, zoom, and align images with your surface for an accurate drawing experience.
- This feature empowers you to draw anything – whether it's a photo you took, a downloaded image, or your own digital creation.

* Drawing Lessons – Learn, Practice, Improve

- Step-by-step drawing guides help you move from basic shapes to advanced techniques.
- Great for beginners who want structured learning or artists looking to refine their skills.
- Lessons are fully integrated with AR drawing for a fully interactive learning experience.

* AI Drawing – Let Ideas Become Art Instantly

- Describe any concept or scene, and our built-in AI generates original artwork within seconds.
- Customize AI-generated images and use them as references for tracing or sketching.
- Ideal for overcoming creative blocks and finding inspiration on demand.

* Search Image – Unlimited Visual Inspiration

- Search directly inside the app to find high-quality image references without switching apps.
- Combine search + AR + import for the fastest and most intuitive drawing workflow possible.

* Recording – Capture Your Entire Creative Process

- Record your drawing sessions from start to finish.
- Perfect for tutorials, sharing your process on social media, or reviewing your progress.
- Export and share with a single tap.

* Coloring Tools – Bring Your Art to Life

- After tracing or sketching, enhance your artwork with easy-to-use coloring tools.
- Play with palettes, gradients, and fill options to make your drawings vibrant and personal.
- Ideal for finished pieces or creative practice sessions.

SMART FEATURES & CUSTOM SETTINGS

- Customizable projection: adjust image placement, zoom, and rotation for optimal drawing alignment.

- User-friendly interface: clean, responsive, and made for creators at any skill level.

- Works seamlessly on both iPhone and iPad.

WHY CREATORS LOVE Sketchify

- AR Drawing is the foundation – unmatched precision and freedom.

- Import anything you want to draw – your photos, AI creations, web images, and more.

- Combines drawing, tracing, coloring, AI, and learning in one powerful app.

SUBSCRIPTION PRICING & TERMS:

- Payment is charged to your iTunes account upon purchase confirmation.
- Manage subscriptions and turn off auto-renewal in Account Settings.
- Subscriptions auto-renew unless canceled 24 hours before the end of the current period, with renewal charged 24 hours prior.
- Canceled subscriptions remain active until the period ends; no refunds are issued.
- Unused portions of free trials are forfeited upon subscription purchase.

Reskin is the best solution for anyone who wants to make their phone screen unique and stylish - it's a complete customization tool for your iPhone.

Personalize your home screen with stunning themes, handcrafted wallpapers, and custom icons. Choose from a huge library of themed widgets, icons, and wallpapers, or easily create your own combinations to make your iPhone reflect your personality. 

Reskin is designed to be accessible to everyone - our quick and easy installation process allows you to personalize your iPhone in minutes.

What makes Reskin special? It offers a range of powerful features:

1. Two icon installation modes for maximum convenience:


Quick Installation: choose your icons, press one button, and Reskin will automatically install them on your phone. 
Manual Installation: download icons as images and create shortcuts manually using the standard "Shortcuts" app. This method ensures faster app opening.

2. Detailed video instructions for easy navigation. 


Reskin offers clear step-by-step video instructions for every stage of the installation process. Video instructions are available in a dedicated section of the app. 

3. Support for a wide range of apps. 
Reskin automatically scans your apps and offers custom icons for them.

4. A huge selection of widgets. 
 
Including different calendar widgets, battery widgets, and picture widgets. Find widgets and themes for every mood and occasion, from minimalist and elegant to vibrant and expressive.

Reskin is the ultimate iPhone customization tool, giving you complete control over your device's look and feel. Mix and match wallpapers, icons, and widgets to create a home screen that perfectly reflects your style.
